value:
$WmMPID_水着チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Swim18,Face|Huh? Where did everyone go? We
were all playing on the beach just a
moment ago, but...$k$pWhere am I now?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|You're in a place born from the chaos
of the Tempest. A different time and
space, in which—$k$p$WmMPID_水着チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Swim18,Face|Mar-Mar! Thank goodness!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Huh? Mar...Mar? Er, um, yes...
It is I, Marth. Your...Mar-Mar...$k$pIf anyone would know Prince Marth—
I mean, me—as well as anyone, it's
you, Tiki.$k$p$WmMPID_水着チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Swim18,Face|Heehee, of course! Oh, but... Why
are you wearing that mask?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Well, you see... There's... There's a
very good reason for that...$k$p$WmMPID_水着チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Swim18,Face|Oh, don't tell me! Let me guess! It's
because... Because Mar-Mar was...
Hmm...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|W-was? You mean "is"! The real
Mar-Mar, I mean, the real Marth...
Ahem, I am—$k$p$WmMPID_水着チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Swim18,Face|I got it! We were splitting watermelons
on the beach, and it was your turn, so
you put on a blindfold!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Y-yes! That's exactly right. You're a
good guesser, Tiki. I was in the
middle of some special training.$k$pIn fact, this mask helped me become
quite the watermelon-splitting expert.$k$pBut we don't have time to chat right
now. Tiki, will you help me cut through
this Tempest?$k$p$WmMPID_水着チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Swim18,Face|Of course, Mar-Mar!$k$p

$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|We've broken through the Tempest.
Thank you, Tiki. And thank the rest of
the brave summer warriors as well.$k$p$WmMPID_水着チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Swim18,Face|Hmm...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Is something the matter?$k$p$WmMPID_水着チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Swim18,Face|That person we fought... Was that...
Was that me as a grown-up?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Oh... Well, you see... How should I
explain this...$k$p$WmMPID_水着チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Swim18,Face|Do I do something bad? Like in my
awful nightmares, when I become a
monster and hurt people?$k$pNo, I won't! I don't want to become a
monster!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Don't worry, Tiki. That was just an
illusion born from the chaos of the
Tempest.$k$pIn the real future, the future I know,
you are very kind to everyone you
meet.$k$p$WmMPID_水着チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Swim18,Face|*sniffle*
Promise?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|I promise, Tiki. You and I are still
good friends in the future.$k$pWhen you grow up, you'll be loved
and known as the Divine Dragon's
oracle, or simply the Voice.$k$pYou'll help to save many, many
people... Including me.$k$p$WmMPID_水着チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Swim18,Face|Really? Hmm...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|So do not worry, Tiki. Because
everything is OK, now and in the
future.$k$pIn fact, you grow into a very
charming—$k$p$WmMPID_水着チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Swim18,Face|Hmm, yeah... Charming...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Tiki?$k$p$WmMPID_水着チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Swim18,Face|Zzz... Zzz...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Aw, Tiki... Did you wear yourself out?
Your ability to drift off so quickly never
changes...$k$p$WmMPID_水着チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Swim18,Face|Mar-Mar...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|...
Oh! Me? Yes, of course. I am—$k$p$WmMPID_水着チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Swim18,Face|I love you, Mar-Mar...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|...$k$pSleep tight, Tiki... And sweet dreams.$k$p
